article_text:
× FROM THE 11 BREAKING WEATHER TEAM THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS ISSUED a Severe Thunderstorm Warning effective until 5:00 PM for Kiowa County... AT 448 PM MDT...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WAS LOCATED OVER HASWELL...OR 40 MILES NORTHEAST OF NORTH LA JUNTA...MOVING NORTH AT 20 MPH. There is also a Tornado Watch effective until 7:00 PM for the counties of Bent, Elbert, Kiowa, Lincoln and Prowers

WATCH COUNTY NOTIFICATION FOR WATCH 213 NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE PUEBLO CO 446 PM MDT THU MAY 26 2016 COC011-061-099-270100- /O.CON.KPUB.TO.A.0213.000000T0000Z-160527T0100Z/ TORNADO WATCH 213 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN COLORADO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST COLORADO BENT KIOWA PROWERS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF

EADS

LAMAR AND LAS ANIMAS.

WATCH COUNTY NOTIFICATION FOR WATCH 213 NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE DENVER/BOULDER CO 1205 PM MDT THU MAY 26 2016 COC039-073-121-270100- /O.NEW.KBOU.TO.A.0213.160526T1805Z-160527T0100Z/ THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS ISSUED TORNADO WATCH 213 IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN COLORADO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL COLORADO ELBERT LINCOLN IN NORTHEAST COLORADO WASHINGTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF

AKRON

KIOWA AND LIMON. . STAY TUNED TO 11 BREAKING WEATHER TEAM FOR THE LATEST INFORMATION

article_metadata.description: A coal train has derailed northeast of Denver near Hudson, but no injuries have been reported.
